title: Friends of the Mayer Museum  · Angelo State University
description: Help ASU’s Mayer Museum showcase the past, present and future of West Texas for our students and the community by joining the Friends of the Mayer Museum.

meta_tags.keywords: Donate to Mayer Museum, museum support, Friends of the Mayer Museum, membership, museum membership, mayer museum membership

paragraphs: By becoming a member of the Friends of the Mayer Museum, you’re building a window into the past and a vision for the future for Angelo State University and the Concho Valley region.
Memberships and contributions support the curricular development, artistic endeavors and scientific studies that make up Angelo State’s educational mission.
After making your first membership donation, keep your annual membership free by volunteering five hours each semester with the Mayer Museum’s community programs and outreach.
In addition to joining Friends of the Mayer Museum, you can also make a one-time donation. Gifts of any size help support collections in the Mayer Museum.
